venue.name: Ron Paul 2012 Revolution Money Bomb Central

item.description: This will be a day we remember the rest of our lives as the day the American People stood up and demanded our nation back ! On December 16, 2007, Ron Paul supporters raised a record $6 Million Dollars for Ron Paul ! They beat their previous one day online record of over $4 Million set just one month earlier on November 5, 2007. http://youtu.be/DKZmI... http://youtu.be/idICP... This year, make this an early Christmas or Hanukkah present for your country and donate all you can. $100 from 200,000 supporters would equal $20 Million. $50 from 200,000 supporters would equal $10 Million. Out of a nation of 315 Million and Millions of Ron Paul supporters, this is possible. Lets shatter the record and send a message to our fellow citizens that we will no longer let this monetary terrorism happen on our watch ! Debt has increased from less than a Trillion in 1980, after 204 years as a nation, to $15 Trillion today, in just 30 years ! http://www.youtube.co... http://youtu.be/6bNiD... In South Florida, we will be having 2 local tea parties. Please send anyone you know down in our area to join us. Please make a local tea party in your area or two and contact the media to cover it ! Below is what we are doing in Florida, just an FYI. Join us at 2 Tea Party Functions. 8am Bubier Park 32 East Las Olas Fort Lauderdale FL We will meet there at 8am and then at 9:30am or so walk over to toss our boxes (with our grievences written on them) off the Andrews Ave Bridge into the New River. then at 5pm We will meet at Watson Island across from Jungle Island on McCarthur Causeway (I395 East from I95). We will meet at 5pm and toss boxes (with our grievences written on them) off the top of the McCarthur Causeway Bridge or from the side of Watson Island. We need every Ron Paul supporter to participate in this important event. The more massive the turnout the more puplicity we can generate for Ron Paul. The local media will be contacted regarding these events so get the word out and plan to attend one or both of these important events. Its a Friday, so start your weekend off promoting liberty and the Champion of the Constitution. http://youtu.be/U9ukh...
item.name: Ron Paul 2012 Boston Tea Party Money Bomb and Local Tea Parties !
